node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log
.env

# React
node_modules/
build/
.env
.vscode/

# Logs
logs/
*.log
*.log.*

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE files
.idea/
.vscode/

# MongoDB data files
*.db
*.bak

# Test-related files
coverage/

# Yarn & npm lock files (if not using both)
yarn.lock
package-lock.json
